function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Modeling the spread of contagious diseases such as COVID-19 in cities.","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of COVID-19 leading to increased cases and potential strain on healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Implementing effective containment measures and vaccination strategies.","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling, and public health surveillance systems.","People":"Residents of cities, healthcare workers, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Public health agencies, government organizations, and research institutions."}]}
